name: Pre-Commit Error Handler
description: Automatically searches Confluence for pre-commit build errors and provides the correct section to the developer

then.prompt:
When a pre-commit build error occurs, search Confluence for similar errors and provide the developer with:
1. Link to the Confluence page with similar errors
2. The exact section from Confluence that matches the error (not the whole page)
3. Kiro's suggested fix based on the error message
4. Code example showing before/after

Confluence URL to search: https://nileshf.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/WEALTHFID/pages/9175041

Also search the local error database at: .kiro/post-mortems/confluence-pre-commit-errors.md

If a similar error is found, show the developer:
- The Confluence page link
- The exact matching section from Confluence
- The local error database entry
- Kiro's suggested fix

If no similar error is found, create a new entry in the local error database and prompt the user to create a Confluence page.

Return all information to the developer in a clear, actionable format.
